data.text: Nea ɛfa Amonfo ho:
Nanso nna no reba,”
“Twa adwo. Hesbon, efisɛ wɔasɛe Ai!
Adɛn nti na wode wʼabon ahorow no hoahoa wo ho,
Mede ehu bɛba wo so,
“Nanso akyiri no, mɛsan de Amonfo adenya ama wɔn,”
Nea ɛfa Edom ho:
Monnan mo ho na munguan,
Sɛ bobetetewfo no baa mo nkyɛn a
Na mɛma Esau ada adagyaw.
Munnyaw mo ayisaa, mɛbɔ wɔn nkwa ho ban.
Nea Awurade se ni: “Sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔmfata sɛ wɔnom kuruwa no nom a, ɛno de adɛn nti na ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔtwe mo aso? Wɔbɛtwe mo aso na mobɛnom nso.
Meka me ho ntam sɛ wɔbɛsɛe Bosra na ayɛ ahodwiriwde, ahohorade ne nnome; na ne nkurow nyinaa bɛsɛe afebɔɔ,” Awurade na ose.
Mate asɛm a efi Awurade nkyɛn:
“Na mɛyɛ wo ketewa wɔ aman no mu,
Ehu a wobɔ
“Edom bɛyɛ ahodwiriwde;
Sɛnea wɔdan Sodom ne Gomora
“Sɛnea gyata a ofi Yordan nkyɛkyerɛ mu
Enti tie nea Awurade ahyehyɛ atia Edom,
Wɔn asehwe nnyigyei bɛma asase awosow;
Monhwɛ! Ɔkɔre bi betu akɔ soro na wabɔ hoo aba fam a
Nea ɛfa Damasko ho:
Damasko ayɛ mmerɛw,
Adɛn nti na wonnyaw kuropɔn a agye din yi ntoo hɔ,
Ampa ara ne mmerante bɛtotɔ wɔ mmɔnten so;
“Mede ogya bɛto Damasko afasu mu;
Nea ɛfa Kedar ne Hasor ahenni, a Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar tow hyɛɛ so no.
Wɔbɛfa wɔn ntamadan ne wɔn nguankuw;
“Munguan nkɔ ntɛmntɛm!
“Sɔre kɔtow hyɛ ɔman bi so a woremmrɛ,
Wɔn mfurum bɛyɛ asade,
“Hasor bɛyɛ ahade ama adompo,
Eyi ne asɛm a, efi Awurade nkyɛn baa odiyifo Yeremia hɔ a ɛfa Elam ho, wɔ Yudahene Sedekia adedi mfiase:
Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se:
Mede mframa anan no bɛba Elam so
Mɛbɔ Elam ahwete wɔ wɔn atamfo anim,
Mesi mʼahengua wɔ Elam
“Nanso mɛsan de Elam adenya ama no
